lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I believe we should all care about one another in this world as brother and sister and if I can give someone a helping hand in a small way that makes a difference to their lives and their familes then I feel happy and know I,ve made a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work with my hands doing reupholstery of furniture and do carpentry work building homes.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I want to help out in a meaningful way
lender.occupational_info: I help pregnant women deliver their babies and new mothers to get off to a successful start with breastfeeding their babies

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because:
I have great admiration for people who work hard to improve the lives of their families. The obstacles that they must overcome are daunting and the money we lend gives them the leg-up that they need to succeed.
It feels good to help.

lender.name: Sergei and Dariya
lender.loan_because: "What seven can do with a spoon, one can do with a plough." - Russian Proverb
lender.occupational_info: My work is somewhat tedious but, hopefully, for the greater good.

lender.name: April and Seth
lender.loan_because: We believe that through concious living we can make a diference in our global community.

lender.name: meredith
lender.loan_because: I think micro-lending works! It connects me to people around the world and makes me feel like, together, with small steps, we can make the global economic system more equitable.
lender.occupational_info: I produce a radio program on CBC Radio, Canada's public broadcaster.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: it allows people in poverty to transform their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in a residency in emergency medicine and hoping to work doing disaster relief and nonprofit administration.

lender.name: Davenport, Iowa
lender.loan_because: I am happy to support such hard-working people.
lender.occupational_info: I garden, knit, and study at college.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I feel that a small loan can create a huge opportunity for someone willing to work hard to better their life as well as the lives of their family.

lender.name: Carl and Gail
lender.loan_because: I want to...
lender.occupational_info: Car mechanic, I work with my hands. Ceramic potter, I make bowls with my hands. "We are the people who make things."

lender.name: Sandy and Blake
lender.loan_because: I heard about Kiva on PBS and thought it is a great way to get involved.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I work with truant students and their families.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want people to feel they can support themselves. No one wants to be beholden forever to another person. Loaning helps someone become self-suffiicient and also lets them know that someone cares about them.
lender.occupational_info: I sew for other people. I make \"Home Dec\" items (i.e., duvets, roman shades, pillows, cushions, etc.).

lender.name: Senjen
lender.loan_because: microcredit for productive use should be available for every person who warrants it.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I believe in this program and I believe responsible lending can be a powerful tool in helping people achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I believe that if a person is able to help another person, they should. Helping others is the most noble thing a person can do.
lender.occupational_info: I take students on trips to places that teach them how amazing the world is!

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: When I looked up what the CEO of the charity I had given to was making I was appalled.I knew there was a better way to make sure that those in need had the oppertunity to \"help them selves.\" I heard about Kiva on NPR.In my life I have had the help of others and I belive in \"passs it on\"
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from 41 years of nursing

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupation: This loan comes from our whole family
lender.loan_because: We are sending this loan in celebration of the winter holidays.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers. My mother, Christine is a doctor and my father, Brock is a businessman. My brother, Scott is a musician and my sister, Jean Marie is an anthropologist. My other sister, Lareissa just got married and is studying to be a doctor as well.

lender.name: Julie and David
lender.loan_because: We have our own small business and have been growing it for the past five years. We want to help support others in the world to accomplish their dreams, too.

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: It's great to be part of an enterprise that is building lives and contributing to our world.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: \"Cash is King\" and to help those who make a real difference in the world!
lender.occupational_info: As founder of InfinitiWireless, a 10 year old company that services telecomuication companies throught the world. We provide repair of microwave radio transmission equipment use by Goverment,Utilities,Schools,Emergency services.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I am happy to be a woman who is in the position to help other women.

lender.name: Ken & Tyler
lender.loan_because: To share some of my very good fortune. Hopefully provide an example for both my children and grandchild through support young entrepeneurs thru Kiva. Other programs like Plan Canada to support young children in areas like Central America, Thailand, Nepal, Phillipines.
lender.occupational_info: Manage a group of young, talented and very creative Software Engineers.

lender.name: Gerald
lender.loan_because: I can, and it does someone else, somewhere else, some good. It\'s Christmas eve here and I saw that this person needed $150 (USD) more. So I loaned it.
lender.occupational_info: I\'m a Business student at the local Community College. I also have a degree from the University, in the field of Computer Science.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I believe it's important to give people an opportunity to improve their lives.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: it's an antidote to poverty, to disenfranchisement, to low self-worth...
lender.occupational_info: I work with nonprofits, foundations, citizen groups, social entrepreneurs and thinkers at the intersection of progressive issues, media, arts and culture, business and big ideas. I use communications and PR to help shape a more sustainable, healthy and just world, promoting people and the planet above profit.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: My brothers & sisters around the world are exactly equal to me in every way possible except I have a little more money, so I will try to even up the situation.
lender.occupational_info: I make films about those in need in hopes those who are OK will help. I have a masters in Visual Anthropology and have made documentary films for 30 years.

lender.name: Quinton
lender.loan_because: We might still be able to make this a better world if we help each other when we can.

lender.name: John and Marie
lender.loan_because: We think this is a great idea and we hope to help any way we can.
lender.occupational_info: Marie is an amazing, talented, warm and compassionate student who will someday be great. John hopes to reach people with his music.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Every one deserves a chance to create a business that will one day help many more people than just the owner of the business.
lender.occupational_info: I help people that are serious about changing their lifestyle for the better. I do one-on-one coaching over the internet or in person.

lender.name: eatkind.net
lender.loan_because: This is a great way for even the poorest residents of the \"First/developed\" world to transfer some of our relative economic advantage to our counterparts across the economic divide.
lender.occupational_info: I primarily use my communications skills to advocate for animal rights and welfare, ethical eating and agriculture and a better global order.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I work with obstetricians and gynecologists to reduce the chances of adverse outcomes that may lead to lawsuits.

lender.name: Maylia
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to be born into a privilaged country and I realize I could have wound up in the same positions any of these people are in. I want to share what I have.

lender.name: Elin,Bjrn
lender.loan_because: people need help

lender.name: Tom Emily Kate & Anna
lender.loan_because: it feels good.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I feel like I can directly impact peoples lives that really need help
lender.occupational_info: Investor, real estate development

lender.name: Anil
lender.loan_because: I understand that right help at the right time can make a huge difference in the lives of people.
lender.occupational_info: I bring together people from different specialities to build highly usable software.

lender.name: Blue Smoke Coffee
lender.loan_because: I started Blue Smoke as a way to give back to the world, while pursuing my passion of roasting great coffee.
lender.occupational_info:
I'm the owner/roaster of a small eco-friendly coffee roasting business. I hand-roast organic, fair trade, shade grown beans using green renewable energy and donate at least 5% of sales to environmental and humanitarian causes.
Blue Smoke Coffee Roasting Co. Coffee with a Soul

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I believe this is a small way for me to have a big impact in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: Our company designs customized business training solutions for our clients.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: All of the people seeking loans at Kiva are an inspiration to me ! I am blessed to live in a country such as Canada and wish to assist others as they strive to improve their lives. Good luck !!!
lender.occupational_info: As a Line Producer I work behind the scenes on various film and television projects. The Line Producer is responsible for ensuring that the project is completed on time and on budget. I am currently working on the Canadian TV series \"Corner Gas\".

lender.name: Tracy & Mark
lender.loan_because: it's fun and gratifying to assist others in realizing their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Tracy is self employed as a massage therapist; Mark is an environmental consultant.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need.
lender.occupational_info: I plan classes for a Unitarian Universalist church.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: This allow us to take an active interest in helping to build better lives. This is not charity. This is a real start for people.
lender.occupational_info: I help solve problems between organizations and get rid of the obstacles that keep people from doing their job.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: My wise old uncle gave Kiva accounts for Christmas. I've got to think Jesus would appreciate that!

lender.name: Roy & JoLynn
lender.loan_because: Because my daughter asked us to donate for her christmas-channukah present .

lender.name: Johanna
lender.loan_because: I believe anyone can achieve their goals with a little bit of help. Creating self sufficiency benefits everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who have developmental disabilites find and maintain employment

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to see other people follow their dreams.

lender.name: Barry & Jeannie
lender.loan_because: We are constantly inspired by the heart, creativity and resourcefulness of the all the loan recipients.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: it's the ultimate model to help people while keeping their dignity.

lender.name: Regina
lender.loan_because: This is very interesting and I think it is a wonderful idea.
lender.occupational_info: I help young children with autism.

lender.name: JoAnn
lender.occupation: doctor of psychology, volunteer emerg responder
lender.loan_because: i believe in positive and interactive communities--and this is one really good way to add value to the global community.
lender.occupational_info: help people in crisis and study clinical problems to be a part of the improvement of science and interventions in mental health care.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I think that microfinance is a great way for the more fortunate people in the world to help those that are not as lucky by giving them an opportunity to improve their lives through running their own business.
lender.occupational_info: Before I retired I helped other Canadians plan how to accumulate some savings that would help them in their retirement.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: EVERYONE needs help once in awhile to gain independence or remain independent. Being independent gives to freedom to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help young people 12-18 years old stop using drugs and alcohol, become independent, and learn to help others.

lender.name: Gioia and Onno
lender.loan_because: Business is something that interests me and if I ever started my own, I also would appreciate help

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I can, and because the need is great

lender.name: Rick and Judy
lender.loan_because: This is a valuable way to assist those who are working for themselves. And the great thing is you can keep doing it over and over again with the same money!
lender.occupational_info: Rick was a reseach scientist investigating the effects of space on satellites and communication systems and developing ways to predict when the effects might occur - for example, solar flares and geomagnetic storms. Judy is a retired graphic artist who runs a non-profit animal rescue organization.

lender.name: Patty and Wyatt
lender.loan_because: it makes sense. We are all in this together. A bank will loan people in the U.S. money for some of the craziest business ideas imaginable, and see the success it has bred. It makes sense that people with great business ideas in other countries should have access to credit also, no matter how small.
lender.occupational_info: Patty is a lawyer and an entrepeneur. She used to work in a courtroom, now she works on her own business projects. Wyatt is a City Manager. Elected officials appoint him to make sure the city operates well. This includes making sure: the trash is picked up, taxes are collected, streets are safe and citizens are happy.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being able to

lender.name: Constance
lender.loan_because: I like to help out hardworking people-in-need and because my granddaughter and grandson-in-law are founders.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from being an executive secretary. I look after my 2 daughters and 4 grandchildren and take daily care of my African Parrot, Jamie.

lender.name: Keara Haldeman
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: To share the resources God has entrusted to me.
lender.occupational_info: Manage computer software development for a railroad company in the United States.

lender.name: andrea
lender.loan_because: because I help people in need by doing something I enjoy

lender.name: Ka-Ping Yee
lender.occupational_info: Most of the United States now votes in elections using electronic voting machines. I work to make these machines more trustworthy, fair, and accessible.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the benefits of micro finance and enjoy having a direct roll in the distribution of my funds. I studied the micro finance model in school and know how effective it can be.
lender.occupational_info: I make environmental documentaries with a special focus on fly fishing and the need to protect pristine watersheds.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the gifts and would like to pass along fellowship and kindness to others.
lender.occupational_info: Recruiting and Training Retail Managers. Manage a team of 4 to do the same and develop their skills.

lender.name: Andrea & Brian
lender.loan_because: it's fun to see what people across the world are doing and to support them in their efforts.
lender.occupational_info: Andrea studies economic issues that impact women. Brian does development and research on small heaters and circuitboards.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinance projects are one of the best hopes of alleviating poverty. They offer opportunities that not only enhance the lives of the people who receive loans, but the benefits extend to their families and the local area in which they live. I was very excited to find out about Kiva, as it gives me a chance to be more closely involved in a process that can truly change lives.

lender.name: Linda & Paul
lender.loan_because: It\\\'s the right thing to do. Those who have should share with those who don\\\'t.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: there are so many people of the world that can have a better life with just a bit of help.

lender.name: weixi
lender.loan_because: 10% Payback in 180 Days\r\nComputer reital Business 3000 SQFT\r\nTry Lone Server
lender.occupational_info: SELL SELL SELL

lender.name: Seb
lender.loan_because: I can help empower people who have the desire to improve their situation through perseverance, hard work and creativity.

lender.name: Ted & Julie
lender.loan_because: We believe in the integrity of the human spirit independent of their religious, social or economic position.

lender.name: Sally or Herb
lender.loan_because: desire to help less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info:
retired fine artist (painting) (Herb)
 retired secretary (Sally)

lender.name: Naomi
lender.loan_because: I can. Through microlending, I'm making a difference to the lives of those excluded from the traditional financial system through contributing to their ability to help themselves and their families to achieve a better quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others to help themselves to improve their social and economic well-being.

lender.name: robert
lender.loan_because: to help create world abundance
lender.occupational_info: I hope to inspire a sense of wonder and joy through art.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful people can change the world. Indeed, it's the only thing that ever has. ~Margaret Mead

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance to live a better life and enjoy living their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I work across the United States with organizations that serve youth everyday afterschool and during the summer .

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: <marquee>I think it\'s important for others who work hard to get something great out of it</marquee>

lender.name: Tom & Wendy
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to be part of the tide of benign globalization.

lender.name: Aimee
lender.loan_because: I believe in business. I believe in women. And owning a business gives women power.
lender.occupational_info: I build brands. Creating new products that you use in your everyday life.

lender.name: D,L,S,H&G
lender.loan_because: We believe in the dreams of each person and how important our individual efforts can be
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer and my husband is an attorney in the technology area

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I hope it will help.
lender.occupational_info: Driving services for individuals and groups of up to 6.

lender.name: Vergil
lender.loan_because: I like being able to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computer problems at a community college.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I work for a non-profit, Choice Humanitarian whose efforts also support micro enterprise and busineses throughout the world. I would like to focus on Mexico, Central, and South America.
lender.occupational_info: We work in Kenya, Nepal, Vietnam, Guatemala, Bolivia, and Mexico in rural development and helping by supporting the communities. We have in country dedicated staff in these countries working all year identifying projects and communities that are in need of our assistance.

lender.name: holly
lender.loan_because: $25 is a drop in the bucket over a lifetime, but that money can go so much farther and contribute to such a bigger, better cause when it's needed. Being able to make that kind of impact is important and a responsibility that everyone should be held accountable for, and I'm so glad that I have an opportunity like this to do my part.
lender.occupational_info:
I work with children impacted by developmental disabilities and their families. Our job here is to create events to help the children socialize, learn and become more independent, as well as help their families to become more educated, gain funding and support. We currently service about 500 families in the northern region of New Jersey.
I have recently started another separate organization that raises funds to distribute to families who have children with Autism. The families who are eligible are in need of aid to cover the cost of care for their child or children (things like medical care, schooling, nutritional needs, respite care). We are hoping to reach all of New York City, New Jersey, and New York and turnover about $500,000 annually to the families. It's a great opportunity for needed services and I'm so proud that our hard work is starting to cover ground!

lender.name: Sharru
lender.loan_because: I've been through some tough times with my family, but I don't really remember struggling for food or shelter. I really want to help people who need it, even though I don't fully understand what they're going through right now.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the ability to make their lives all they want it to be.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a major canadian bank helping people make financial transactions, manage their money, save and invest

lender.name: Anika
lender.loan_because: Because some people are really poor and need the extra help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in second grade.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It\'s Christmas and I feel like donating to a worthy cause that I\'ve discovered thru my son.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and live in Logan, Utah

lender.name: Yi-Jeng
lender.loan_because: I believe there are individuals who can succeed in life despite the situations they were born with.
lender.occupational_info: I help ensure the drugs produced at our company is up and beyond the standards set by the Canadian Government.

lender.name: Tom and Ann
lender.loan_because: We are so fortunate to be able to give.
lender.occupational_info: Tom is a retired college professor and Ann worked in libraries.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I believe what Mother Teresa said: None of us can do anything great on our own, but we can all do a small thing with great love. I hope that this small thing will make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work with doctors writing for medical publications that are used primarily to train new physicians and to enhance the quality of health care provided to patients around the world.

lender.name: Dennis and Alex
lender.loan_because: we are able to and the world needs a little kindness where-ever and whenever it can get it.

lender.name: Caitlin G.
lender.occupation: secret agent (oops! forget I said that)
lender.loan_because: I'd like to be of service to the people of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a coffee roaster for an organization that promotes and sells fair trade, organic coffee. Our origins right now are Ethiopia, Guatemala, Sumatra, Brasil,Peru, Rwanda, Zambia and El Salvador.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Recently, we lost Don Thomson, a loving spouse to Julie and father to his 5 children (Ron, Rick, Randy, Marney, David) and 3 step-children (Derek, Wade, Tracy). We wanted to make this donation as a tribute to his generosity.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I believe in the concepts of personal responsibility
lender.occupational_info: I take care of peoples skin diseases and assit in running Health care systems

lender.name: joop and kitty
lender.loan_because: I have experienced many difficulties and roadblocks associated with starting up a business

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: originally it was a christmas gift from my boyfriend; now I think it\'s so wonderful to be able to help out others! Everyone should get involved...so little can do so much!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am an articling student.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.occupational_info: I help to bring low cost medicine to people in the USA.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.occupational_info: Fireman

lender.name: william
lender.loan_because: This investment has a social impact.
lender.occupational_info: Higher Education

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I believe that anyone can be successful in business. Helping others reach their goals is a goal of mine
lender.occupational_info: I am a business education teacher. I teach business courses to high school students.

lender.name: Lowell
lender.loan_because: Those of us that have should share.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an auto factory.

lender.name: Tom
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses determine the size and types of computers and software they need to solve their technology problems.

lender.name: Fernando
lender.loan_because: It is good for everyone

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I feel like it\'s the least I can do to help out the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help large manufactures recycle their waste wood rather than land filling it.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I like to help others and do as much as I can to help the world.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school

lender.name: Norm
lender.loan_because: I have and they don't.
lender.occupational_info: I design, build and operate computer networks.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: We really can change the world...one person at a time!

lender.name: Bert
lender.loan_because: Microloans improve peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: I keep computers and networks running at a medium-sized business.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I have so much, and it takes so little to help others. With Kiva, my original gift can be given again and again. What an amazing concept! Watching people rising out of poverty; to be a small part of this is such a gift.
lender.occupational_info: I give people tools and teach them how to use them. In particular, I teach them about the power of their thoughts.

lender.name: Tiina
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who dare to dream of a better life which is built on their own hard work.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I can't think of any better way I have heard to help those who need help and are willing to become more self-sufficient. I am blessed and want to share with others and hope they will be blessed and share as well.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children--age 11 and 12 years old.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Kiva allows me to connect directly with someone in another country. I have the ability to choose, and see, where my money goes.
lender.occupational_info: I work in various developing countries (currently Indonesia) for NGOs, developing database systems to improve the efficiency of their operations.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I live by The Golden Rule--treat others as you would like to be treated.
lender.occupational_info: I build and remodel houses.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: People have loaned to me.
lender.occupational_info: I drive a tow truck in Alaska. My work is often hard. Sometimes exciting, sometimes dangerous. Always with beautiful scenery.

lender.name: barbara
lender.loan_because: i like the idea of ordinary people helping each other
lender.occupational_info: I work with young children who have special needs such as blind, deaf, autistic, etc. I use play and games as ways to make them physically stronger and develop social and mental skills

lender.name: Hannah
lender.occupational_info: I\'m still in high school but I want to major in graphic design and minor in marketing.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: it's my way of saying thank you.

lender.name: Val
lender.loan_because: It\'s the right thing to do.

lender.name: Willie
lender.loan_because: I don't have much but I have a lot more than some.
lender.occupational_info: I write for a living and for pleasure. If my writing makes me money, great. If not, i still write. If I need money, I find a way to make my writing create some. If it doesn't work, I use something else, like my body.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: it makes sense

lender.name: Bartels Family
lender.loan_because: In honor of \"Oma\" who throughout her life reached out and helped others.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: I loan Because my dad got me a gift certificate for 50 dollars to loan and because my mother\'s father is Moldavian.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: Do it !

lender.name: Luke
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Louisiana State University to become a civil engineer so one day I can help people in developing countries.

lender.name: Josh Barry
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I am a lifelong entrepreneur and know how hard it is to get businesses funded.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach special education to city youths ages 5 to 15. I have been a teacher for almost 40 years.

lender.name: Amie
lender.loan_because: its important

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: It\'s a win-win situation. They get the financial help thats needed for their business. I get to fulfill a need I have right now to serve a purpose.

lender.name: Riggins Family
lender.loan_because: We're blessed with the opportunity to do so.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I lead and manage a large facility located in a beautiful forest that provides a place for children to spend meaningful time during the summer.

lender.name: Nadine & Jan
lender.loan_because: We like the micro-loans as developed by Kiva

lender.name: Larry, Verona, and Noa
lender.loan_because: We hope that by helping others to prosper, our granddaughter Noa will live in a more peaceful and better world.
lender.occupational_info: Prior to retirement, Verona & Larry were software engineers. Also Peace Corps volunteers: Sierra Leone 1964-1966. Photo taken at Sacsayhuaman, Cusco, Peru

lender.name: Kayla, Amy and Nikiah

lender.occupational_info: We are brothers and sisters and families living in Pennsylvania, Vermont, Massachusetts, Alaska, and Mississippi.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.occupational_info: Me is used in many constructions where strict grammarians prescribe I. This usage is not so much ungrammatical as indicative of the shrinking range of the nominative form: me began to replace I sometime around the 16th century largely because of the pressure of word order. I is now chiefly used as the subject of an immediately following verb. Me occurs in every other position: absolutely, emphatically, and after prepositions, conjunctions, and verbs, including be. Almost all usage books recognize the legitimacy of me in these positions, especially in speech; some recommend I in formal and especially written contexts after be and after as and than when the first term of the comparison is the subject of a verb.

lender.name: Think Small Lenders
lender.loan_because: Such a small amount of money can make such a big difference in people's lives and their communities.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I was born in Africa and lived there for many of the best years of my life. I feel that I can give something back and help others on the continent.
lender.occupational_info: I am an accountant, working on a contract basis

lender.name: Olesya
lender.loan_because: I want to believe that as i plod along on my insignificant road i can add an infinitessimal particle here and there to someone else's well being and it will matter. Everyone should have the right to be well and happy every once in a while. I don't think that's too much to ask.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I believe in making a difference, one small step at a time. I believe in local economies, and want to support those who are willing to take actions. And because I care.
lender.occupational_info: I work with individuals, teams, and organizations - increasing the awareness of our world and its interconnectedness.

lender.name: Anna-Berthe

lender.occupational_info: We drive the children to and from School

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: #1. I have more than I nead. \r\n#2. I love to see people who have the tools they need to be creative and to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Old Dog Films try to help an American audience understand how US policies affect people in the developing world. It is our hope that once people know what\'s being done in their name (and with their tax dollars) they will demand that the US government change policies that are unjust and exploitive.

This site contains programs you can download and listen. If you would like to subscribe to the H&T Podcast, use this link in your podcatcher or add it to your Favorites feed list. http://duhlman.podbean.com/feed

lender.loan_because: We can and we choose to.

lender.occupational_info: I work in a special ed middle school for children who are emotionally disturbed. I work in the office and do the computer work for the school.

lender.name: Keval
lender.loan_because: Simply to make a difference. Banks and Large Finance Companies can not help you unless you help them. It\'s our responsibility to help out our fellow human beings to better their lives and cause a chain reaction throughout the human race, one person at a time =)
